comments:
Build 20020806

- create a new Run-time workbench launch target
- change the name to Target
- Apply is not enabled
- click elsewhere
- it prompts whether to save the unsaved changes

The Apply button should be enabled when there are changes to save.

I also changed the workspace data field to be d:\temp\eclipse, and the Apply 
button still wasn't enabled.

I had previously reimported all binary projects without deleting the old ones.
I deleted all binary projects and reimported, then recreated the launch 
target.  This time it worked, except for the disappearance of the launch 
button.  I'll file a separate PR for this.
